name: Shakib Al Hasan
comment: When I was in America, I got pain on my teeths. Danial's treatment recover me very quickly.

name: MS Dhoni
comment: Teeth pain I mean, going to the America and show Mr. Danial. A responsible person I have ever seen.

name: Steve Smith
comment: Mr. Danial's treatment is one of the best teeth treatments I have ever seen. God bless you man.

name: Jennifer Lopez
comment: As a singer, I have to keep always smiling and happy. Thanks to Mr. Danial's Treatment. Really love it.

name: Neymar JR
comment: In south America it's difficult to get proper teeth treatment. That's why I love to show my pain to Mr. Danial.

name: Lional Messi
comment: Me and Neymar always choose Mr. Danial for our teeth treatment. One of my favorite persons I have ever meet.
